        private static void printInputAndLengths(java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> input)

      • printInput

        private static void printInput(java.lang.String title,
                               java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> input,
                               boolean withLengths)
        Prints out the content of the string array list with a title above. When the withLengths is set to True, the length of each element in the array list will be displayed. Conversely, if the withLengths is set to be False, the length of each element in the array list will not be displayed.
        Parameters:
        title - A title of the string array list
        input - A list of strings
        withLengths - True: to include the lengths of each element in the string array list; False: to not include the lengths of each element in the string array list

      • printSortedInput

        private static void printSortedInput(java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> input)

        Parameters:
        input - A list of strings

      • getInput

        private static java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> getInput(java.lang.String fileName)
        Reads words from the Scanner until there are no more words in the file which has the input fileName and returns these words in a list of strings. If the file with the input fileName cannot be found, the method returns nothing and prints out a message to notice the error.
        Parameters:
        fileName - A name of the file which the Scanner reads
        Returns:
        The list of strings which contains the content in the file which has the input fileName; Nothing if an error is found.

      • generateRandomInts

        private static int[] generateRandomInts()
        Generates 15 random integers between 0 and the maximum value (2 to the power of 20) inclusive and returns the integers
        Returns:
        The array of the 15 random integers which has values between 0 and maximum value (2 to the power of 20) inclusive.

        Returns:

      • getAverage

        private static double getAverage(int[] input)
        Computes and returns the average of the integers in the array. If the array has no elements, this method will return 0.0.
        Parameters:
        input - An array of integers
        Returns:
        The average of the integers

      • getStdDev

        private static double getStdDev(int[] input)
        Computes and returns the standard deviation of the integers in the array. If the array has no elements, this method will return 0.0.
        Parameters:
        input - An array of integers
        Returns:
        The standard deviation of the integers in the array; 0 if the array has no elements
